member.name: T:SongDLL.Song
member.summary: This class is responsible for playing, stopping and pausing a song. It has all the logic that controls the Windows Media Player object.

member.name: M:SongDLL.Song.Play
member.summary: Starts a song that is stopped or paused in a new thread.

member.name: M:SongDLL.Song.PlaySong
member.summary: Plays a new song (the new song is loaded through its path into the WMP object's URL attribute)

member.name: M:SongDLL.Song.PauseSong
member.summary: Pauses a song that is currently playing and kills the thread that it was playing in. The thread will be constructed again when the song will be resumed.

member.name: M:SongDLL.Song.StopSong
member.summary: Stops a song that is currently playing. It also kills the thread that the song was playing in.

member.name: M:SongDLL.Song.GetSongDurationString
member.summary: This function returns current time of the song as a string with the format HH:MM:SS.
member.returns: The actual duration of the selected song.

member.name: M:SongDLL.Song.GetSongDurationDouble
member.summary: This function returns duration of a song in seconds.
member.returns: The actual duration of the selected song.

member.name: P:SongDLL.Song.SongPath
member.summary: Property that sets/retrieves the path of a song.

member.name: P:SongDLL.Song.SongName
member.summary: Property that sets/retrieves the name of a song.

member.name: P:SongDLL.Song.PassedTime
member.summary: Property that sets/retrieves the elapsed time of a song.

member.name: P:SongDLL.Song.Wplayer
member.summary: Property that retrieves the Windows Media Player object.
